documents.document: You get the best compliments when you have pink hair. "Your hair reminds me of candy floss and it makes me SO happy"
@BR3NDA @adamshand But don't let it get frosted coz frost will kill 'em.
@BR3NDA @adamshand says Late April / May is traditional time, but otherwise it's just a 'the more you leave it in the bigger it gets'-ish.
@GrumpyYetAmusin when? if it's afternoon i might be able to make it.

@JoshForde @newzedland @Dovil so e.g. an Iranian/NZ person might be going to Iran via the US and show an Iranian passport normally.
@JoshForde @newzedland @Dovil yes, but if they found out, they'd still ban you. I usually travel on the passport of the country I'm going to
@newzedland @Dovil i think that's at least part of why it's causing so much carnage. no one is quite sure what to do.
@Dovil yep. an NZ/Iranian person, for example, would totally be included in the ban, as far as I can tell.
@jason_aldous by which I mean, Yay WorkerBe Oasis! They're cool! :)
@jason_aldous WorkerBe also own KaiCycle who organise urban composting - they give you a bucket for your kitchen & come & collect it weekly.

This is SO not what I meant to say. https://t.co/BgCZCyyKLD
@PeopleofNZ I know right?? I was so unhappy.

Listening to Wham! and dressing up the dog. What all good Boxing Days are made of. https://t.co/L0dYV6PagL
Now I'm worried she's just dangling there on the roof waiting for me to turn off the light again. Spiders, man.
Dog dream-yips woke me, so I turned on the light to calm him down. Big spindly spider ~ an inch from my pillow booting it back up her line.
@eoinkelly I'm pretty pleased with how it came out!! :)
An hour walk mostly uphill and he still wants more. Frikken collies, man, like little energiser bunnies. Indefatigaâ€¦ https://t.co/vfcPiCKQr0
Flights sorted for GABS Melbourne next year. Now I just have to get tickets :)
Holy cow, I'm exhausted.
Clint Eastwood. Riding a skateboard. In Italy. In the 60s. https://t.co/ehH9t0sio9
Well. A long entertaining evening having met a friend for dinner who was already VERY drunk. But bedtime now. Thank goodness.
@__catpower and then proceeded to try to kiss me about three minutes later!! I was like "WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU"
@__catpower "i don't understand, why are they awful and all bed hopping and what what what" and he was like "OMG I KNKOW THIS IS CRAZY"
@__catpower it was genuinely awful. i was talking to one of the ppl i thought of as a good friend saying "why are all these people mental"
@__catpower heck no, nor an assistant, luckily! :) i was a manager of a back office team (no one else from my team was 'allowed' to come)
@__catpower i remember crying in the bathroom because i suddenly realised i genuinely hated most of my workmates. i quit not long after.
@__catpower i went to a "managers away weekend" where half the partners proceeded to sleep with each others' assistants.

Oh thank goodness I figured out how to turn off the news feed on my phones swipe left screen. #nomorebadnews
@PeopleofNZ also opinions about whisky are many and varied, so YMMV :) taste em! Try em!
@PeopleofNZ (ice makes it cold -> surpresses flavour mostly)
@PeopleofNZ the AA (Abba-lure A-boon-a) is smoky and rich, the B (Buh-na-halve-en) is sweet, sherried etc. drink straight or w/ water.
@PeopleofNZ nope, sorry :( I recommend finding a good pub and asking for an Abelour A'bunadh & a Bunnahabhain 12yo. Opposite ends of scale.
@PeopleofNZ are you in Wellington? regional wines & spirits do great tastings on a regular basis!!
